sys_script_include.name: FHFieldExplorer

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f3d6ef848316721083e1b4a6feaad324
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1310794_founda_0.FHFieldExplorer</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>FHFieldExplorer</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[/**
 * FHFieldExplorer - Utility for exploring custom fields in ServiceNow tables
 */
var FHFieldExplorer = Class.create();
FHFieldExplorer.prototype = {
    /**
     * Get custom fields for a specific table
     * @param {String} tableName - Name of the table
     * @returns {Object} Result containing fields array
     */
    getCustomFields: function(tableName) {
        var result = {
            table: tableName,
            fields: []
        };

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
        gr.query();

        if (!gr.next()) {
            throw new Error("Table not found: " + tableName);
        }

        var elementGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary_overrides');
        elementGr.addQuery('sys_dictionary', gr.sys_id);
        elementGr.addQuery('element', 'NOT LIKE', 'sys_');
        elementGr.orderBy('element');
        elementGr.query();

        while (elementGr.next()) {
            result.fields.push({
                name: elementGr.getValue('element'),
                label: elementGr.getValue('label'),
                type: elementGr.getValue('internal_type'),
                mandatory: elementGr.getValue('mandatory') === 'true',
                max_length: elementGr.getValue('max_length'),
                reference: elementGr.getValue('reference') || null
            });
        }

        return result;
    },

    type: 'FHFieldExplorer'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-03 06:11:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>f3d6ef848316721083e1b4a6feaad324</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FHFieldExplorer</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer" source="x_1310794_founda_0">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f3d6ef848316721083e1b4a6feaad324</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-03 07:50:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
